thread.title: Les Moonves: $500k for Tom Brady Jersey??? Even I Wouldn't Pay That! (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Les Moonves: $500k for Tom Brady Jersey??? Even I Wouldn't Pay That! (VIDEO) | TMZ.com

author: TMZ Staff
title: Les Moonves: $500k for Tom Brady Jersey??? Even I Wouldn't Pay That! (VIDEO)
text:
EXCLUSIVE
CBS honcho Les Moonves reportedly makes $60 MILLION per year!!!!
And even HE thinks $500,000 for Tom Brady 's Super Bowl jersey is an INSANE number.
Interesting thing is Les would probably be a real contender to buy the jersey if it's ever recovered and put up for sale ... he's a huge Patriots fan who loves Tom Brady.
... but he's not a sucker.
